ygData.subject: Re: Lambent Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: There are Goblins wizards in Perma that have see invis, I tried to go in invis and got attacked, and then died  8( The King room in Perma is also quite hard so
ygData.messageBody:
There are Goblins wizards in Perma that have see invis, I tried to go in
invis and got attacked, and then died 8(

The King room in Perma is also quite hard so I have heard, need a group of
25's to hold it.

Madagan




roleplay@... on 11/11/99 13:41:04

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: [eqbards] Lambent Armor




From: <roleplay@...>

I am headed tonight to get the Icy Greaves from Permafrost. Then to Unrest
and Castle Mistmoore for
the other items.

I am only level 21 but my Invis worked great in Upper Guk. Is the same true
for getting to the
proper room in Permafrost? I know it is not in the undead areas but I have
to try them to.

Any suggestions or help on how to acquire these would be great!

Thanks
Ranian Aeleroth
Bard of the 21st song

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
